name: Yamaha R15
description: One of the best sports bike in BD.It is japanese origin and sporty looking bike.Milage is very good compare to others.

name: Royal Enfield
description: Boss look with stylish Royal enfield.Demand is very high in Market.Targeted mostly young students.

name: Royal Enfield Himalayan
description: Best for long tour and special for non-smooth road.This comes with 410cc power , which makes it special.

name: KTM
description: Speed king with sporty look.It has advance breaking system and handaling is very comfortable.

name: Yamaha RS
description: New comer in the market and hype is very high as it comes with very attractive looking and gives high milage.

name: Yamaha FZS v2
description: One of the best bike in its price range and it is ruling the market.Soon it going to market out.Though, demand is very high.
